summary: Added QA regression coverage for daemon environment smoke validation, including required-file health-check failures and smoke-script queue/policy/state pass/fail behavior.
Added QA regression coverage for Codex command preflight, including Windows codex.cmd shim resolution and environment-validation integration.
checks: REDKEEPERS_CODEX_COMMAND='__rk_missing_codex_for_test__ exec' + python tools/orchestrator.py status (fails preflight with override hint)

summary: Expanded daemon environment health checks for queue/state files and added a read-only smoke validator for queue/policy/state parsing.
Reconciled backlog state for RK-M1-0001, RK-M1-0002, RK-M0-0002, and RK-M0-0003 by moving already-delivered items from blocked to completed with audit evidence notes.
Added M1 scaffold smoke coverage for backend/client/design-data artifacts and documented manual client-shell verification checks for responsive layout and placeholder-art compliance.

proposed_work_items.title: Run browser-based visual smoke pass for M1 client shell breakpoints
proposed_work_items.description: Execute the documented manual checklist for the client shell at desktop/tablet/mobile widths and confirm placeholder-art-only compliance with screenshots or notes.
acceptance_criteria: Manual verification checklist in agents/tomas-grell/manual-verification-rk-m1-0008.md is executed in a browser
Responsive behavior at >=1221px, 861-1220px, and <=860px is recorded with pass/fail notes
Placeholder-art policy compliance is explicitly confirmed or violations are logged

summary: Attempted browser-based visual smoke pass for M1 client shell, but sandbox/runtime restrictions prevented Chromium/Edge from launching for interactive rendering/screenshots.
checks: python subprocess Chromium/Edge headless screenshot probe (fails: platform_channel Access is denied, crash server failed to launch)

proposed_work_items.title: Execute RK-M1-0008 browser visual smoke on non-sandbox host
proposed_work_items.description: Run the existing manual checklist in agents/tomas-grell/manual-verification-rk-m1-0008.md using a browser-capable daemon/host session where Chromium can launch and capture evidence.
acceptance_criteria: Desktop/tablet/mobile checks are executed in-browser with pass/fail notes
Keyboard and IntersectionObserver interaction smoke is validated manually
Placeholder-art-only compliance is visually confirmed with screenshots or explicit violation notes
dependencies: Browser-capable execution environment (no sandbox block on Chromium/Edge launch)

summary: Added Codex model-policy compatibility preflight checks for both startup validation and per-run execution to avoid repeated fallback retries on unsupported models, and ensured blocked runs now capture model-requested/model-used/fallback fields.

proposed_work_items.title: Add regression tests for codex model access preflight paths
proposed_work_items.description: Create focused tests that cover startup status preflight failures, fallback selection preflight behavior, and blocked run_history/model_stats fields for unsupported model profiles.
acceptance_criteria: status validation fails fast with exact unsupported-model reason when policy model is inaccessible and no usable fallback exists
execution selects configured fallback when primary model preflight fails and proceeds to run
blocked run_history and model-stats entries include model_requested/model_used/fallback fields

summary: Added regression tests that assert escalation model resolution to gpt-5.3-codex-spark and validate model-policy accessibility for both standard and escalation paths, including a deterministic unsupported-model preflight fail condition before execution.
